mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, password, name, age, role) VALUES( #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.name, m.age, m.role FROM member m WHERE m.id=#{id} AND m.password=#{password}
SELECT m.id, m.name, m.age, m.role FROM member m WHERE m.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name=#{name}, age=#{age} WHERE id=#{id}
